name: djangorest-backbone
description: Library to make possible the use of Django REST Framework with Backbone Framework

scripts.build: cp lib/djangorest-backbone.js build/djangorest-backbone.js && uglifyjs lib/djangorest-backbone.js --mangle --output build/djangorest-backbone.min.js --source-map build/djangorest-backbone.min.map && cp lib/djangorest-backbone.extensions.js build/djangorest-backbone.extensions.js && uglifyjs lib/djangorest-backbone.extensions.js --mangle --output build/djangorest-backbone.extensions.min.js --source-map build/djangorest-backbone.extensions.min.map

author: Leandro Moreno moreno.leandro.g@gmail.com
